title.narrative: Governance and systems for Country Programme Implementation

description.narrative: Management and governance systems and mechanisms functioning very effectively and efficiently. Country Management Team, Joint Consultative Committee, Partnership Review Committee and Property Survey Board meetings regularly held to monitor key management indicators. Enterprise Risk Management plan reviewed and updated and Audit recommendations sustained. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/12/2017

target.value: 2017:Reduce CO2 emission by at least 18.15 Kg

2017:Reduce CO2 emission by at least 18.15 Kg

actual.value: 2017:Following the implementation of the greening Project, there was significant reduction of CO2 emissions as a result of airco-saver installed to existing air conditioning systems and all bulbs replaced with LED to improve on their energy efficiency.
